summary: Against the tumultuous backdrop of Iran's 1953 CIA-backed coup d'état, the destinies of four women converge in a beautiful orchard garden, where they find independence, solace and companionship.
cast: Shabnam Toloui|Pegah Ferydoni|Arita Shahrzad|Orsolya Tóth|Ahmad Hamed|Navid Navid|Bijan Daneshmand|Essa Zahir|Tahmoures Tehrani|Abbas Bakhtiari|Mehdi Moinzadeh|Farhad Payar|Shahrnoush Parsipour|Said Oveissi|Mithra Zahedi|Mina Azarian|Shahbaz Noshir|Nader Farman|Youssef Nabil|Natasha Chudyk|Aziz Hattab|Soussan Azarin|Fadma Hammou Maadini|Fouad Saad Allah|Khalid Elwadi|Mohammed Alaoui|Salma Daneshmand|Rahi Daneshmand
keywords: rape|iran|f rated|1953 iranian coup d'etat|police crackdown
title: Women without men
